meanings.definition: A verb meaning to cause goosefleshes or goosebumps on someone's skin.
meanings.sent1: The scary movie gave me goosefleshes.
meanings.sent2: She felt goosefleshes on her arms when the cold wind blew.
meanings.sent3: The haunted house tour was so spooky, it gave everyone goosefleshes.
meanings.sent4: The eerie silence in the forest made goosefleshes appear on my skin.
meanings.sent5: The sudden sound of thunder caused goosefleshes to ripple across her body.

meanings.definition: A noun referring to the raised bumps on the skin caused by cold, fear, or excitement.
meanings.sent1: The winter chill left goosefleshes on his arms.
meanings.sent2: Her excitement at winning the game caused goosefleshes to appear.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected compliment from her boss gave her goosefleshes.
meanings.sent4: The thrilling roller coaster ride left goosefleshes all over her body.
meanings.sent5: The suspenseful movie scene created goosefleshes on the audience's skin.
